comment:
logistics:Logistics refers to the detailed coordination of a complex operation involving many people, facilities, or supplies, such as the transportation of goods or resources.
units of water per minute:This refers to the amount of water that can be transported through a pipe in a given time frame, typically measured in gallons, liters, or other volume units per minute.
minimize:To minimize in this context means to reduce or optimize the total number of pipes required to meet the water transportation needs efficiently and effectively.
